articles.title: GV, the VC team backed by Google, has a broad remit, but it can’t do one thing - TechCrunch
articles.description: David Krane is in an enviable position. As the CEO of GV, the venture firm that is funded entirely by Google to the tune of $1 billion a year, his team of
articles.content: David Krane is in an enviable position. As the CEO of GV, the venture firm that is funded entirely by Google to the tune of $1 billion a year, his team of roughly 100 gets to make a lot of bets with … [+3053 chars]
